personalInfo.name: Babar Yaqoob
personalInfo.title: AI Developer & Data Analyst
personalInfo.summary: Master’s (M2) student in Artificial Intelligence at ECE Paris. I build LLM apps, n8n automations, and analytics pipelines. Experience with SQL/Power BI/Python ETL at QuipSol; deploying full-stack AI tools and publishing research-backed AI/crypto articles.

experience.title: Data Analyst
achievements: Automated SQL-based workflows and reports (~30% less manual work).
Built ETL for BI dashboards; data cleaning, validation, QA.
Maintained structured datasets to support ML model testing (pandas, Excel, Power BI).

experience.title: AI Developer & Data Analyst
achievements: Shipped StudyMate-AI tutor, AI automation dashboard, and dynamic portfolio site (Next.js + Framer Motion).
Integrated OpenAI/Gemini APIs with n8n; containerized tasks; basic CI/CD to Vercel/Azure.
Developed forecasting/anomaly notebooks and data-viz dashboards.

experience.title: AI/Blockchain Research Writer
achievements: Published 30+ how-tos and explainers on AI agents, trading signals, and modular chains.
Followed Cointelegraph/AlphaWire editorial checklist (metrics, limitations, SEO, source hygiene).

projects.title: Dynamic Portfolio Website
projects.description: Animated, responsive portfolio powered by a JSON content model; deployed on Vercel.

projects.title: StudyMate-AI
projects.description: AI tutor that generates study plans, quizzes, and notes using LLMs; n8n automations.

projects.title: Outworld Dungeons (2.5D Platformer)
projects.description: Solo Unity + C# platformer with physics puzzles and AI-driven enemies; custom UI/audio.

topSkills.name: Python
topSkills.justification: ETL, analytics notebooks, basic ML; pandas/TensorFlow/PyTorch exposure.

topSkills.name: SQL & Power BI
topSkills.justification: QuipSol pipelines and dashboards with measurable automation impact.

topSkills.name: React/Next.js
topSkills.justification: Dynamic portfolio and LLM app UIs; Vercel deployments.

topSkills.name: AI/ML Integration
topSkills.justification: OpenAI/Gemini APIs, n8n automations, forecasting/anomaly prototypes.

topSkills.name: Data Engineering (basic)
topSkills.justification: CSV/Excel to dashboards, QA/validation, reproducible ETL flows.

insights.careerTrajectory: From analytics and research writing toward AI engineering and automation products.

nextSteps: Ship one production-grade LLM micro-SaaS (auth, billing, logging).
Harden ETL with tests and data contracts.
Contribute to an open-source Next.js or n8n plugin.

summary.strengths_analysis: Solid analytics foundation plus growing AI integration; comfortable across data → app → deploy.
summary.career_trajectory: Expanding from BI and research into shipping useful AI tools.
summary.technical_focus: LLM integrations, ETL reliability, full-stack delivery.
summary.learning_recommendations: Invest in cloud data tooling and evaluation/monitoring for AI features.
